title: Produkter
text:
V√•ra produkter

```{r} library(readr) library(dplyr) library(glue)


L√§s in lagret
lager <- read_csv(‚Äúdata/lager.csv‚Äù, show_col_types = FALSE) |> mutate( status = if_else(saldo > 0, paste0(‚ÄúI lager:‚Äù, saldo), ‚ÄúSlut‚Äù), klass = if_else(saldo > 0, ‚Äúlager‚Äù, ‚Äúslut‚Äù) )


Skapa HTML-kort
html_cards <- glue_data( lager, ‚Äô
